sourcesContent:
<template>

  <InfoProducts :items="array" @parent_change_product="changeProductData" @change_delete="changedeleteProduct"/>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios"
import InfoProducts from "@/components/products/InfoProducts";

export default {
  name: "ProductList",
  components: {
    InfoProducts,
  },

  data(){
    return {
      baseUrl: 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/clients/getInfo',
      array:[],
    }
  },
  methods: {
    changedeleteProduct(){
      axios.delete('https://dummyjson.com/products/')
    },

    changeProductData(newProductsData) {
      let index = this.array.findIndex(i => i.id === newProductsData['id'])
      let last_name_doc = newProductsData.last_name_doc
      let first_name_doc = newProductsData.first_name_doc
      axios.put('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/clients/update-clients/' + newProductsData.id, {last_name_doc, first_name_doc})
      this.array[index] = newProductsData
    }
  },
  async created() {
    try {
      const {status, data} = await axios.get(this.baseUrl);
      if (status === 200) {
        this.array = data.products
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.log(e.response)
    }
  },
  beforeMount() {
  },
  updated() {
  },
  beforeUnmount() {
  },
  computed:{
    postsComputed(){
      let newPosts = []
      return newPosts
    }
  }
}

</script>

<style scoped>
button{
  margin-left: 2%;
}
</style>
